Html:
Dear D3 CodePlex Project --

Is Dynamic Data dead?

Is this CodePlex project dead?

It seems like "yes" to both, given that a search for "Dynamic Data" on CodePlex yields nothing more recent than 2012.

What do you think?

Please advise.

Thanks.

-- Mark Kamoski

I believe the original project was largely created by Mikhail who did a great job; however, I think he has dropped out of the project due to other pressing needs.

Mikhail also started a newer version at http://d3future.codeplex.com/ but I believe he has dropped out of that project also.

D3 is a great charting program that needs some code cleanup for performance and it certainly could use better documentation.

David
